about_the_game:
A war of faith has erupted in Heathmoor between dangerous fanatics and the Relic Inquisition, and innocent people are caught in the middle. Join the battle with the Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen, a full-body customization that transforms you into a rogue Pirate who makes it her mission to end the horrific war for good.

The Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen offer includes:
- One Pirate Hero Skin
- Seven-Day Champion Status
- Three Scavenger Crates
detailed_description:
A war of faith has erupted in Heathmoor between dangerous fanatics and the Relic Inquisition, and innocent people are caught in the middle. Join the battle with the Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen, a full-body customization that transforms you into a rogue Pirate who makes it her mission to end the horrific war for good.

The Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen offer includes:
- One Pirate Hero Skin
- Seven-Day Champion Status
- Three Scavenger Crates

package_groups.title: Buy FOR HONOR™ - Pirate Hero Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 | AMD FX-4300 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 / GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM | AMD Radeon R9 270 / R9 370 / RX460 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1080 with 3 GB VRAM or more | AMD Radeon RX580 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.

short_description: Become a rogue warrior with the Hero Skin of Inquisitor Yinchen, a full-body customization of the Pirate.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech
*languages with full audio support
